bibl.title: Supplement II to J.K. Elliott, A Bibliography of Greek New Testament Mauscripts. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Supplement to: J. Keith ELLIOTT, A Bibliography of Greek New Testament Manuscripts. 2nd Edition = Society for New Testament Studies. Monograph Series. 109 (Cambridge, 2000). The first supplement was published in: NT 46 (2004) pp. 376-400.
ELLIOTT J.K., Supplement II to J.K. Elliott, A Bibliography of Greek New Testament Mauscripts. Avec résumé en anglais.
